Activities

Class ActivityBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activities.ActivityBank

  • public class ActivityBank
extends java.lang.Object
    General class that contains all activities that need to be launched on demand Also contains many common test methods used for setup or for navigating through the app
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • ClickSignUpAndEnterUserID

        public static void ClickSignUpAndEnterUserID(java.lang.String UserID)
        Assumes LOGINActivity has been started, goes through the process of clicking on sign up and entering user ID
        Parameters:
        UserID - User ID to be used for signing up
        See Also:
        SignUp, Login

      • SignUpAsUser

        public static void SignUpAsUser(java.lang.String UserID,
                                int Checkbox)
        Assumes LOGINActivity has been started, goes through the process of signing the user in. Should end up in the correct home menu activity after.
        Parameters:
        UserID - User ID to be used for signing up
        Checkbox - id of checkbox from R on sign up page to be clicked (ex: R.id.ProviderCheckbox)
        See Also:
        SignUp, Login

      • SignUpAsUserAndLogin

        public static void SignUpAsUserAndLogin(java.lang.String UserID,
                                        int Checkbox)
                                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Assumes LOGINActivity has been started, goes through the process of signing the user up and logging the user in. At provider or patient home at the end
        Parameters:
        UserID - User ID to be used for signing up
        Checkbox - id of checkbox from R on sign up page to be clicked (ex: R.id.ProviderCheckbox)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        See Also:
        SignUp, Login

        public static void changeToTestIndex()
        Changes index to point at the testing index
        See Also:
        INDEX_TYPE, GlobalSettings

      • WipeAllUsers

        public static void WipeAllUsers()
                         throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Uses Elasticsearch Patient and Provider controllers to wipe all users from elasticsearch
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        See Also:
        ElasticsearchPatientController, ElasticsearchProviderController

      • CommonSetUp

        public static void CommonSetUp()
                        throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes index to the testing index and wipes all users from the database
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        See Also:
        ElasticsearchPatientController, ElasticsearchProviderController, INDEX_TYPE, GlobalSettings

        Parameters:
        UserID - Expected UserID to be found on View User Activity
